title: 第一屆英文估粵語流行曲大賽 (4)

replies.msg:
繼續

1. Forgive me for wanting to hold your arms tight right now, and see through how dark it is inside the light shadows.

2. If I could spot him earlier, I could have ordered take away instead, while he already sat down with his wife.

3. Who is sitting next to me, drinking half of the delicious wine? Who’s willing to stay with me, sharing half of the happiness and sadness?

4. Come everybody, we all exist regardless of you and me. No matter which era we stay in, the flowers will open again in spring.

5. As the scenery changes, the direction has differed, the eyeballs have rolled, the wheel has leaned by me, not even I could stop it.

6. I give you this letter, tell you to believe more firmly. There is a cycle of good and ridiculous things in this world, you will be able to understand.

7. If no one choose you, after the storm and rain, do your best show with the gentleness of a whale coming out the water.

8. Very quiet, clear as water. Right now, a man triggered bits of remembrance.

9. This pain tell me to retreat, nobody is forever crying. I want this pain to end, but I hear my heart beating.

10. Tomorrow separates you and me, we knew feelings will fade. Who can tell what’s in my mind, I say goodbye as if I’m dodging.

replies.msg:
俾啲tips你
4. 同另外一題係同一個歌手
9. 上過叱咤十大

1. Are you tired? Admit the fate
More you don't want to separate, earlier it fades
I don't want to play anymore
My love ends so miserably

2. I shout out loud to the sky again and agin,
never got any reply
Maybe it regards human beings as a joke
Tears become flowers, people don't have to miss
Forget about it if cannot love me
Or are you feel scared

3. If able to have one more minute the world being vast
if able to have one more minute to be happy honestly
Not much, can have one more minute the paradise of humans
Time goes everyday, but how much it is forgotten

replies.msg: 巴打勁

再出幾題冷門嘢

1. We hug each other, let the air conditioning liberate the hotness
Can't care about the window sweating anymore
We are anxious
Suspect whether we should be tgt again,
who want to tell
Though hugging, hugging to cold sweat, cold sweat

2. Lovers' little dream to reunite, leave a part open a part a new part
Although there's no enough karma for humans' circle
We can still meet in our life

3. if if we can't die together, please die first die first die first die first
To let you become a butterfly in the sky,
leave me to be a zombie

到我再出題 今次黎啲易啲嘅

1. When all the bright roads on the world have been walked, maybe it’s better not to see any light, drag the heaven into underground and be undisturbed forever.

2. Walking silently on the road, the hot summer is like a waterfall. I didn’t realise you caught a flu, who could have expected you are already complaining about me not able to find the pharmacy?

3. Who made the green hills change, turning into tacky faces? Who made the blue seas change too, becoming turbid water flushing up to the sky?

4. Maybe you are willing to, change your cute personality drastically. If I want, I wish to relax a bit. Unless you are willing to, remember to tell me as cruelly as possible, then I can become more mature and frank.

5. Always separated in two sides of high ladders, there is more than twenty meters of distance between us.

再黎五首難少少嘅：

1. When I rise my head and watch the stars hanged up on the ankle of the sky, suddenly feel I am as limited as dust.

2. Who knows whether every door would open, continue to reach out my hand and knock, I can do it.

3. Hearing fingertips climbing through steep cliffs, hearing breaths blowing the sound of sea waves, not kissing also lead to forgetting, kissing once also lead to no shape.

4. Why I can’t get rid of the bad thoughts even I have a wife, have a partner? Always can’t control my emotions, when will I get mad? Who’s guilty? Who’s ashamed?

5. Knowing for only one day, how can I make decision? We just first met, how can I ensure the fire of love will still burn tomorrow?

quote.msg:
繼續

1. Forgive me for wanting to hold your arms tight right now, and see through how dark it is inside the light shadows.

2. If I could spot him earlier, I could have ordered take away instead, while he already sat down with his wife.

3. Who is sitting next to me, drinking half of the delicious wine? Who’s willing to stay with me, sharing half of the happiness and sadness?

4. Come everybody, we all exist regardless of you and me. No matter which era we stay in, the flowers will open again in spring.

5. As the scenery changes, the direction has differed, the eyeballs have rolled, the wheel has leaned by me, not even I could stop it.

6. I give you this letter, tell you to believe more firmly. There is a cycle of good and ridiculous things in this world, you will be able to understand.

7. If no one choose you, after the storm and rain, do your best show with the gentleness of a whale coming out the water.

8. Very quiet, clear as water. Right now, a man triggered bits of remembrance.

9. This pain tell me to retreat, nobody is forever crying. I want this pain to end, but I hear my heart beating.

10. Tomorrow separates you and me, we knew feelings will fade. Who can tell what’s in my mind, I say goodbye as if I’m dodging.

replies.msg: 明天將你我分離 明知感覺會疏離

replies.msg:
終極side tracks：

1. The problem is I’m loving you more and more deeply, getting ready to complain about the sky and earth. What makes you think we can last until white hair and death too?

2. If you don’t bang on walls, how will you know my value? Don’t even think that I will fix sex. Indulging in me, spend half of your life and all your strength, it’s your stupidity and lack of savvy.

3. Suffering? Please rely. Even memories collapse too. The door can be closed, the heart can be sheltered. Remove world matters then take a breath.

4. The silent murder, I never realised it even after my death. Don’t believe that the world is so ugly and evil, until I satisfied some harsh demand. Had my pockets empty, realised that everything is discriminating me.

5. Forgot about the remaining temperature of the sunset, but only can’t forget your loneliness, stay in the blanket sometimes cold and sometimes hot, identifying who I’m having a fever for from my cold sweat.

quote.msg:
終極side tracks：

1. The problem is I’m loving you more and more deeply, getting ready to complain about the sky and earth. What makes you think we can last until white hair and death too?

2. If you don’t bang on walls, how will you know my value? Don’t even think that I will fix sex. Indulging in me, spend half of your life and all your strength, it’s your stupidity and lack of savvy.

3. Suffering? Please rely. Even memories collapse too. The door can be closed, the heart can be sheltered. Remove world matters then take a breath.

4. The silent murder, I never realised it even after my death. Don’t believe that the world is so ugly and evil, until I satisfied some harsh demand. Had my pockets empty, realised that everything is discriminating me.

5. Forgot about the remaining temperature of the sunset, but only can’t forget your loneliness, stay in the blanket sometimes cold and sometimes hot, identifying who I’m having a fever for from my cold sweat.

quote.msg:
終極side tracks：

1. The problem is I’m loving you more and more deeply, getting ready to complain about the sky and earth. What makes you think we can last until white hair and death too?

2. If you don’t bang on walls, how will you know my value? Don’t even think that I will fix sex. Indulging in me, spend half of your life and all your strength, it’s your stupidity and lack of savvy.

3. Suffering? Please rely. Even memories collapse too. The door can be closed, the heart can be sheltered. Remove world matters then take a breath.

4. The silent murder, I never realised it even after my death. Don’t believe that the world is so ugly and evil, until I satisfied some harsh demand. Had my pockets empty, realised that everything is discriminating me.

5. Forgot about the remaining temperature of the sunset, but only can’t forget your loneliness, stay in the blanket sometimes cold and sometimes hot, identifying who I’m having a fever for from my cold sweat.

5. 忘掉了日落餘溫 惟獨你寂寞忘不掉
在被窩忽冷也忽熱 從冷汗辨明為誰發燒

淨係識呢首 巴打好癲

replies.msg:
呀1都識
問題是愈來愈愛你
預備抱天怨地
何事你也以為能夠 到白頭到死

之後真係估唔到了

經典舊歌

1. Now I'm like taking platinum elevator, go up to the highest place
Stepping on the moon and stars showing my skills in the universe, the earth jumps up fascinatingly

2. Sky ends everyday, ground ends everyday
Even heart can't forsee
I'm not small anymore
Let yesterday ends in a morning
Or some day, some night, some morning, I'm tired

replies.msg:
1. 兒歌? 電影？
Cold wind and the frost cooled my hearth
The ice mountain was frozen as if it was a dream
Just like descending to the outside of the world
Staring at this empty snowy mountain

Wave and wave of cold wind, hurting my face, going crazy in the sky
My heart panic at this moment, panic disturbed my dream

3.
Already missed your birthday
Came in a rush
Leave in disappointment

4. 呢個譯得好差 電視劇
May thoughts could be endless, does not depends on the present, the past nor the future
Even if this body one day turns entirely into dust,
could still be with you in the cosmos

Snow has been spreaded on the neon lights
Like saying goodbye to everything in the world
Can not distunguish the season, this freezing April, 最後一句放棄

推多最後一次，加多少少
真係冇人聽過定我改得太差
